recipe_name: Sun-blushed tomato, black olive and shaved Manchego salad
author: Nick Nairn
method: Place all of the ingredients into a large bowl and stir well to combine. To serve, place into a serving dish.
ingredients: large handful flatleaf parsley, leaves only,  Â¼ red onion, finely sliced,  50g/2oz Manchego cheese, shaved with a vegetable peeler,  50g/2oz sun-blushed tomatoes,  30g/1oz black olives, stones removed,  2 tbsp olive oil,  2 tsp balsamic vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
